creator: Carly Solutions GmbH & Co KG
descriptionHtml:
The most versatile OBD2 scanner — Carly — is more than a car diagnostic tool. It now works for almost all car brands in the world that have an OBD2 port.

Over a million car owners gain powerful insights and on average save $500 a year with Carly.

The Carly app and the Carly Universal Adapter access your car’s data through the OBD2 port and translate complex information into powerful insights. You can control your car with your smartphone, wherever you are. Test it now!

👉Every car is unique — specific features will vary with every model, build year, hardware, and software. Get more details here: https://bit.ly/2WvLfIo

——————————
BASIC FEATURES INCLUDED IN THE (FREE) LITE VERSION

Health (OBD), Live Data (OBD), and Emission Check (OBD) enable you to have control over the most important systems — engine and transmission. Check if they work for your car.

ADVANCED FEATURES INCLUDED IN THE FULL VERSION (SUBSCRIPTION)

These are supported for the following car brands: Audi, BMW, Lexus, Mercedes, Mini, Porsche, Renault, Seat, Skoda, Toyota, and VW. Every car is unique, so specific features will vary with every model, build year, hardware, and software. Check here: https://bit.ly/2WvLfIo

🔧 CHECK THE CAR’S HEALTH AND SAVE MONEY
With Carly car diagnostics, you’ll have the right scanner tool to read from all built-in electronic control units (ECUs), including engine, transmission, ABS, airbag, & multimedia, keep track of your car’s health, gauge the severity of problems, clear fault codes, and more.

🔧 MONITOR LIVE DATA
Live parameters or live data can help you take the guesswork out of understanding what your car needs and detect the fault origins.

🔧 CODE AND CUSTOMIZE FEATURES
Access hidden features already set by the manufacturer and customize your car to fit your needs. This feature is only available on certain car brands/models, and the coding options vary.

🔧 PERFORM SIMPLE CAR MAINTENANCE INDEPENDENT OF THE WORKSHOP
Analyze emission and engine gauges, change and register your car battery, perform an oil reset, and much more, all with your smartphone.

🔧 DETECT MILEAGE MANIPULATION
Car mileage manipulation is on the rise. Don’t get tricked. Use Carly to perform a used car inspection before buying.

All of your reports are automatically saved into your account in the Digital Garage.

Visit https://bit.ly/2zy5bT9

—————————
HOW IT WORKS:

Step 1: Check which features are available for your car model here: https://bit.ly/2WvLfIo
Step 2: Order your Carly Universal Adapter.
Step 3: Plug the adapter into the OBD2 port and log in on this app to check what works for your unique car.
Step 4: Upgrade to the full app version — if available for your car.

THE CARLY UNIVERSAL ADAPTER

The OBD2 device was designed to support almost all car brands with an OBD2 port (built 2001 or later), works with both iOS and Android software, and enables advanced Carly features. The adapter comes with:
👉 A lifetime warranty
👉 Premium customer support
👉 A 30-day money-back guarantee

Visit https://bit.ly/2xSpWIZ

THE CARLY APP

The Carly app offers a free lite version. For some brands with supported advanced features, you get a full one-time health check, together with one error report, and one used car check report.
The full version works for BMW, Mini, Toyota, Lexus, VW, Audi, Skoda, Seat, Mercedes, Renault, and Porsche.

You can purchase a subscription for an individual car brand or for all car brands. Pricing information: https://bit.ly/2YJXyUs

—————————

This is a yearly subscription. Payment is handled via your Google Play Account. Subscription automatically renews for one year if not canceled 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. The subscription can be managed in your Account Settings and the automatic renewal can be deactivated there.

Terms of Use
https://bit.ly/35Mxg5s

Privacy Policy
https://bit.ly/35Rruze
descriptionShort: 🚗Versatile OBD2 scanner: car diagnostics, coding, maintenance

title: Carly

creator: Carly Solutions GmbH & Co KG
descriptionHtml:
The most versatile OBD2 scanner — Carly — is more than a car diagnostic tool and helps over a million car owners on average save $500 a year. Test it yourself now!

Get the Carly app and the Carly Universal Adapter that access data through the OBD2 port of your car. They translate it into powerful diagnostic insights, coding, and maintenance functions, so you can control your car wherever you are.

The adapter and the app work for Audi, BMW, Lexus, Mercedes, Mini, Porsche, Renault, Seat, Skoda, Toyota, VW, and almost all car brands in the world with an OBD2 port.

👉Every car is unique — specific features will vary with every model, build year, hardware, and software. Get more details here: https://bit.ly/2WvLfIo
——————————
BASIC FEATURES INCLUDED IN THE (FREE) LITE VERSION

Health (OBD), Live Data (OBD), and Emission Check (OBD) enable you to have control over the most important systems — engine and transmission. Check if they work for your car.

ADVANCED FEATURES INCLUDED IN THE FULL VERSION (SUBSCRIPTION)

These are supported for the following car brands: Audi, BMW, Lexus, Mercedes, Mini, Porsche, Renault, Seat, Skoda, Toyota, and VW. Every car is unique, so specific features will vary with every model, build year, hardware, and software. Check here: https://bit.ly/2WvLfIo

🔧 CHECK THE CAR’S HEALTH AND SAVE MONEY
With Carly car diagnostics, you’ll have the right scanner tool to read from all built-in electronic control units (ECUs), including engine, transmission, ABS, airbag, & multimedia, keep track of your car’s health, gauge the severity of problems, clear fault codes, and more.

🔧 MONITOR LIVE DATA
Live parameters or live data can help you take the guesswork out of understanding what your car needs and detect the fault origins.

🔧 CODE AND CUSTOMIZE FEATURES
Access hidden features already set by the manufacturer and customize your car to fit your needs. This feature is only available on certain car brands/models, and the coding options vary.

🔧 PERFORM SIMPLE CAR MAINTENANCE INDEPENDENT OF THE WORKSHOP
Analyze emission and engine gauges, change and register your car battery, perform an oil reset, and much more, all with your smartphone.

🔧 DETECT MILEAGE MANIPULATION
Car mileage manipulation is on the rise. Don’t get tricked. Use Carly to perform a used car inspection before buying.

All of your reports are automatically saved into your account in the Digital Garage.

————————
HOW IT WORKS:

Step 1: Check which features are available for your car model here: https://bit.ly/2WvLfIo
Step 2: Order your Carly Universal Adapter.
Step 3: Plug the adapter into the OBD2 port and log in on this app to check what works for your unique car.
Step 4: Upgrade to the full app version — if available for your car.

THE CARLY UNIVERSAL ADAPTER - MOST ADVANCED OBD DEVICE

The OBD2 device was designed to support almost all car brands with an OBD2 port (built 2001 or later), works with both iOS and Android scanner software, and enables advanced Carly features. The adapter comes with:
👉 A lifetime warranty
👉 Premium customer support
👉 A 14-day money-back guarantee

Visit https://bit.ly/2xSpWIZ

THE CARLY APP

The Carly app offers a free lite version. For some brands with supported advanced features, you get a full one-time health check, together with one error report, and one used car check report.
The full version works for BMW, Mini, Toyota, Lexus, VW, Audi, Skoda, Seat, Mercedes, Renault, and Porsche.

You can purchase a subscription for an individual car brand or for all car brands.
——————

This is a yearly subscription. Payment is handled via your Google Play Account. Subscription automatically renews for one year if not canceled 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. The subscription can be managed in your Account Settings and the automatic renewal can be deactivated there.

Terms of Use
https://bit.ly/35Mxg5s

Privacy Policy
https://bit.ly/35Rruze

Get the Carly app and the Carly Universal Adapter that access data through the OBD2 port of your car. They translate it into powerful diagnostic insights, coding, and maintenance functions, so you can control your car wherever you are.

The adapter and the app work for Audi, BMW, Ford, Lexus, Mercedes, Mini, Porsche, Renault, Seat, Skoda, Toyota, VW, and almost all car brands in the world with an OBD2 port.

👉Every car is unique — specific features will vary with every model, build year, hardware, and software. Get more details here: https://bit.ly/37PzItX
——————————
BASIC FEATURES INCLUDED IN THE (FREE) LITE VERSION

Health (OBD), Live Data (OBD), and Emission Check (OBD) enable you to have control over the most important systems — engine and transmission. Check if they work for your car.

ADVANCED FEATURES INCLUDED IN THE FULL VERSION (SUBSCRIPTION)

These are supported for the following car brands: Audi, BMW, Lexus, Mercedes, Mini, Porsche, Renault, Seat, Skoda, Toyota, and VW. Every car is unique, so specific features will vary with every model, build year, hardware, and software. Check here: https://bit.ly/37PzItX

🔧 CHECK THE CAR’S HEALTH AND SAVE MONEY
With Carly car diagnostics, you’ll have the right scanner tool to read from all built-in electronic control units (ECUs), including engine, transmission, ABS, airbag, & multimedia, keep track of your car’s health, gauge the severity of problems, clear fault codes, and more.

🔧 MONITOR LIVE DATA
Live parameters or live data can help you take the guesswork out of understanding what your car needs and detect the fault origins.

🔧 CODE AND CUSTOMIZE FEATURES
Access hidden features already set by the manufacturer and customize your car to fit your needs. This feature is only available on certain car brands/models, and the coding options vary.

🔧 PERFORM SIMPLE CAR MAINTENANCE INDEPENDENT OF THE WORKSHOP
Analyze emission and engine gauges, change and register your car battery, perform an oil reset, and much more, all with your smartphone.

🔧 DETECT MILEAGE MANIPULATION
Car mileage manipulation is on the rise. Don’t get tricked. Use Carly to perform a used car inspection before buying.

All of your reports are automatically saved into your account in the Digital Garage.

————————
HOW IT WORKS:

Step 1: Check which features are available for your car model here: https://bit.ly/37PzItX
Step 2: Order your Carly Universal Adapter.
Step 3: Plug the adapter into the OBD2 port and log in on this app to check what works for your unique car.
Step 4: Upgrade to the full app version — if available for your car.

THE CARLY UNIVERSAL ADAPTER - MOST ADVANCED OBD DEVICE

The OBD2 device was designed to support almost all car brands with an OBD2 port (built 2001 or later), works with both iOS and Android scanner software, and enables advanced Carly features. The adapter comes with:
👉 A lifetime warranty
👉 Premium customer support
👉 A 14-day money-back guarantee

Visit https://bit.ly/3bLwnxv

THE CARLY APP

The Carly app offers a free lite version. For some brands with supported advanced features, you get a full one-time health check, together with one error report, and one used car check report.
The full version works for BMW, Mini, Toyota, Lexus, VW, Audi, Skoda, Seat, Mercedes, Renault, Porsche and Ford.

You can purchase a subscription for an individual car brand or for all car brands.
——————

This is a yearly subscription. Payment is handled via your Google Play Account. Subscription automatically renews for one year if not canceled 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. The subscription can be managed in your Account Settings and the automatic renewal can be deactivated there.

Terms of Use
https://bit.ly/35Mxg5s

Privacy Policy
https://bit.ly/35Rruze
descriptionShort: OBD2 scanner — diagnostics, coding, maintenance for Audi, BMW, Mercedes, VW ...

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- All Carly brands in ONE app
- Fault information for BMW models between 2005 and 2020 improved with additional repair tips (only available for selective faults)
- Ford diagnostics now available as professional workshop level diagnostics! Carly will now show you the same error codes (incl. fault descriptions) as in a Ford workshop
- Improved fault texts and new parameter function for all supported Mercedes models

title: Carly — OBD2 car scanner

creator: Carly Solutions GmbH & Co KG
descriptionHtml:
The most versatile OBD2 scanner — Carly — is more than a car diagnostic tool and helps over a million car owners on average save $500 a year. Test it yourself now!

Get the Carly app and the Carly Universal Adapter that access data through the OBD2 port of your car. They translate it into powerful diagnostic insights, coding, and maintenance functions, so you can control your car wherever you are.

The adapter and the app work for Audi, BMW, Ford, Lexus, Mercedes, Mini, Porsche, Renault, Seat, Skoda, Toyota, VW, and almost all car brands in the world with an OBD2 port.

👉Every car is unique — specific features will vary with every model, build year, hardware, and software. Get more details here: https://bit.ly/37PzItX
——————————
BASIC FEATURES INCLUDED IN THE (FREE) LITE VERSION

Health (OBD), Live Data (OBD), and Emission Check (OBD) enable you to have control over the most important systems — engine and transmission. Check if they work for your car.

ADVANCED FEATURES INCLUDED IN THE FULL VERSION (SUBSCRIPTION)

These are supported for the following car brands: Audi, BMW, Lexus, Mercedes, Mini, Porsche, Renault, Seat, Skoda, Toyota, and VW. Every car is unique, so specific features will vary with every model, build year, hardware, and software. Check here: https://bit.ly/37PzItX

🔧 CHECK THE CAR’S HEALTH AND SAVE MONEY
With Carly car diagnostics, you’ll have the right scanner tool to read from all built-in electronic control units (ECUs), including engine, transmission, ABS, airbag, & multimedia, keep track of your car’s health, gauge the severity of problems, clear fault codes, and more.

🔧 MONITOR LIVE DATA
Live parameters or live data can help you take the guesswork out of understanding what your car needs and detect the fault origins.

🔧 CODE AND CUSTOMIZE FEATURES
Access hidden features already set by the manufacturer and customize your car to fit your needs. This feature is only available on certain car brands/models, and the coding options vary.

🔧 PERFORM SIMPLE CAR MAINTENANCE INDEPENDENT OF THE WORKSHOP
Analyze emission and engine gauges, change and register your car battery, perform an oil reset, and much more, all with your smartphone.

🔧 DETECT MILEAGE MANIPULATION
Car mileage manipulation is on the rise. Don’t get tricked. Use Carly to perform a used car inspection before buying.

All of your reports are automatically saved into your account in the Digital Garage.

————————
HOW IT WORKS:

Step 1: Check which features are available for your car model here: https://bit.ly/37PzItX
Step 2: Order your Carly Universal Adapter.
Step 3: Plug the adapter into the OBD2 port and log in on this app to check what works for your unique car.
Step 4: Upgrade to the full app version — if available for your car.

THE CARLY UNIVERSAL ADAPTER - MOST ADVANCED OBD DEVICE

The OBD2 device was designed to support almost all car brands with an OBD2 port (built 2001 or later), works with both iOS and Android scanner software, and enables advanced Carly features. The adapter comes with:
👉 A lifetime warranty
👉 Premium customer support
👉 A 14-day money-back guarantee

Visit https://bit.ly/3bLwnxv

THE CARLY APP

The Carly app offers a free lite version. For some brands with supported advanced features, you get a full one-time health check, together with one error report, and one used car check report.
The full version works for BMW, Mini, Toyota, Lexus, VW, Audi, Skoda, Seat, Mercedes, Renault, Porsche and Ford.

You can purchase a subscription for an individual car brand or for all car brands.
——————

This is a yearly subscription. Payment is handled via your Google Play Account. Subscription automatically renews for one year if not canceled 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. The subscription can be managed in your Account Settings and the automatic renewal can be deactivated there.

Terms of Use
https://bit.ly/35Mxg5s

Privacy Policy
https://bit.ly/35Rruze

Get the Carly app and the Carly Universal Scanner that access data through the OBD2 port of your car. They translate it into powerful diagnostic and repair insights, coding, and maintenance functions, so you can control your car wherever you are.

The scanner and the app work for Audi, BMW, Ford, Mercedes, Mini, Porsche, Renault, Seat, Skoda, Toyota, VW, and almost all car brands in the world with an OBD2 port.

👉Every car is unique — specific features will vary with every model, build year, hardware, and software. Get more details here: https://bit.ly/2WvLfIo
——————————
BASIC FEATURES INCLUDED IN THE (FREE) LITE VERSION

Health (OBD), Live Data (OBD), and Emission Check (OBD) enable you to have control over the most important systems — engine and transmission. Check if they work for your car.

ADVANCED FEATURES INCLUDED IN THE FULL VERSION (YEARLY LICENSE)

Every car is unique, so specific features will vary with every model, build year, hardware, and software. Check here: https://bit.ly/2WvLfIo

🔧 CHECK THE CAR’S HEALTH AND SAVE MONEY
With Carly car diagnostics, you’ll have the right scanner tool to read from all built-in electronic control units (ECUs), including engine, transmission, ABS, airbag, & multimedia, keep track of your car’s health, gauge the severity of problems, clear fault codes, and more.

🔧 GET REPAIR SUPPORT (NEW)
With Smart Mechanic get detailed fault descriptions written by expert mechanics, which will help you to understand your car's fault codes better. Find detailed repair tips which will help you find the cause of the error and perform more repairs on your own.

🔧 CODE AND CUSTOMIZE FEATURES
Access hidden features already set by the manufacturer and customize your car to fit your needs. This feature is only available on certain car brands/models, and the coding options vary.

🔧 PERFORM SIMPLE CAR MAINTENANCE INDEPENDENT OF THE WORKSHOP
Analyze emission and engine gauges, change and register your car battery, perform an oil reset, and much more, all with your smartphone.

🔧 DETECT MILEAGE MANIPULATION
Car mileage manipulation is on the rise. Don’t get tricked. Use Carly to perform a used car inspection before buying.

All of your reports are automatically saved into your account in the Digital Garage.

————————
HOW IT WORKS:

Step 1: Check which features are available for your car model here: https://bit.ly/2WvLfIo
Step 2: Order your Carly Universal Scanner.
Step 3: Plug the scanner into the OBD2 port and log in on this app to check what works for your unique car.
Step 4: Upgrade to the full app version — if available for your car.

THE CARLY UNIVERSAL SCANNER - MOST ADVANCED OBD DEVICE

The OBD2 device was designed to support almost all car brands with an OBD2 port (built 2001 or later), works with both iOS and Android scanner software, and enables advanced Carly features. The scanner comes with:
👉 A 30-year warranty
👉 Premium customer support

Visit https://bit.ly/2xSpWIZ

THE CARLY APP

The Carly app offers a free lite version. For some brands with supported advanced features, you get a full one-time health check, together with one error report, and one used car check report.
Advanced features are available for BMW, Mini, Toyota, Lexus, VW, Audi, Skoda, Seat, Mercedes, Porsche, Ford, GM and more.

You can purchase a license for an individual car brand or for all car brands.
——————

This is a yearly license. Payment is handled via your Google Play Account. The license automatically renews for one year if not canceled 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. The subscription can be managed in your Account Settings and the automatic renewal can be deactivated there.

Terms of Use
https://bit.ly/35Mxg5s

Privacy Policy
https://bit.ly/35Rruze

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- All Carly brands in ONE app
- Fault information for VW, Audi, Seat and Skoda models between 2008 and 2020 improved with additional repair tips (only available for selective faults)

descriptionHtml:
The most versatile OBD2 scanner — Carly — is more than a car diagnostic tool and helps over a million car owners on average save £500 a year. Test it yourself now!

Get the Carly app and the Carly Universal Scanner that access data through the OBD2 port of your car. They translate it into powerful diagnostic and repair insights, coding, and maintenance functions, so you can control your car wherever you are.

The scanner and the app work for Audi, BMW, Ford, Mercedes, Mini, Porsche, Renault, Seat, Skoda, Toyota, VW, and almost all car brands in the world with an OBD2 port.

👉Every car is unique — specific features will vary with every model, build year, hardware, and software. Get more details here: https://bit.ly/2WvLfIo
——————————
BASIC FEATURES INCLUDED IN THE (FREE) LITE VERSION

Health (OBD), Live Data (OBD), and Emission Check (OBD) enable you to have control over the most important systems — engine and transmission. Check if they work for your car.

ADVANCED FEATURES INCLUDED IN THE FULL VERSION (YEARLY LICENSE)

Every car is unique, so specific features will vary with every model, build year, hardware, and software. Check here: https://bit.ly/2WvLfIo

🔧 CHECK THE CAR’S HEALTH AND SAVE MONEY
With Carly car diagnostics, you’ll have the right scanner tool to read from all built-in electronic control units (ECUs), including engine, transmission, ABS, airbag, & multimedia, keep track of your car’s health, gauge the severity of problems, clear fault codes, and more.

🔧 GET REPAIR SUPPORT (NEW)
With Smart Mechanic get detailed fault descriptions written by expert mechanics, which will help you to understand your car's fault codes better. Find detailed repair tips which will help you find the cause of the error and perform more repairs on your own.

🔧 CODE AND CUSTOMIZE FEATURES
Access hidden features already set by the manufacturer and customize your car to fit your needs. This feature is only available on certain car brands/models, and the coding options vary.

🔧 PERFORM SIMPLE CAR MAINTENANCE INDEPENDENT OF THE WORKSHOP
Analyze emission and engine gauges, change and register your car battery, perform an oil reset, and much more, all with your smartphone.

🔧 DETECT MILEAGE MANIPULATION
Car mileage manipulation is on the rise. Don’t get tricked. Use Carly to perform a used car inspection before buying.

All of your reports are automatically saved into your account in the Digital Garage.

————————

Step 1: Check which features are available for your car model here: https://bit.ly/2WvLfIo

🔧 GET REPAIR SUPPORT (NEW)

title: Carly — OBD2 car scanner

creator: Carly Solutions GmbH & Co KG
descriptionHtml:
The most versatile OBD2 scanner — Carly — is more than a car diagnostic tool and helps over a million car owners on average save £500 a year. Test it yourself now!

Get the Carly app and the Carly Universal Scanner that access data through the OBD2 port of your car. They translate it into powerful diagnostic and repair insights, coding, and maintenance functions, so you can control your car wherever you are.

The scanner and the app work for Audi, BMW, Ford, Mercedes, Mini, Porsche, Renault, Seat, Skoda, Toyota, VW, and almost all car brands in the world with an OBD2 port.

👉Every car is unique — specific features will vary with every model, build year, hardware, and software. Get more details here: https://bit.ly/2WvLfIo
——————————
BASIC FEATURES INCLUDED IN THE (FREE) LITE VERSION

Health (OBD), Live Data (OBD), and Emission Check (OBD) enable you to have control over the most important systems — engine and transmission. Check if they work for your car.

ADVANCED FEATURES INCLUDED IN THE FULL VERSION (YEARLY LICENSE)

Every car is unique, so specific features will vary with every model, build year, hardware, and software. Check here: https://bit.ly/2WvLfIo

🔧 CHECK THE CAR’S HEALTH AND SAVE MONEY
With Carly car diagnostics, you’ll have the right scanner tool to read from all built-in electronic control units (ECUs), including engine, transmission, ABS, airbag, & multimedia, keep track of your car’s health, gauge the severity of problems, clear fault codes, and more.

🔧 GET REPAIR SUPPORT (NEW)
With Smart Mechanic get detailed fault descriptions written by expert mechanics, which will help you to understand your car's fault codes better. Find detailed repair tips which will help you find the cause of the error and perform more repairs on your own.

🔧 CODE AND CUSTOMIZE FEATURES
Access hidden features already set by the manufacturer and customize your car to fit your needs. This feature is only available on certain car brands/models, and the coding options vary.

🔧 PERFORM SIMPLE CAR MAINTENANCE INDEPENDENT OF THE WORKSHOP
Analyze emission and engine gauges, change and register your car battery, perform an oil reset, and much more, all with your smartphone.

🔧 DETECT MILEAGE MANIPULATION
Car mileage manipulation is on the rise. Don’t get tricked. Use Carly to perform a used car inspection before buying.

All of your reports are automatically saved into your account in the Digital Garage.

————————
HOW IT WORKS:

Step 1: Check which features are available for your car model here: https://bit.ly/2WvLfIo
Step 2: Order your Carly Universal Scanner.
Step 3: Plug the scanner into the OBD2 port and log in on this app to check what works for your unique car.
Step 4: Upgrade to the full app version — if available for your car.

THE CARLY UNIVERSAL SCANNER - MOST ADVANCED OBD DEVICE

The OBD2 device was designed to support almost all car brands with an OBD2 port (built 2001 or later), works with both iOS and Android scanner software, and enables advanced Carly features. The scanner comes with:
👉 A 30-year warranty
👉 Premium customer support

Visit https://bit.ly/2xSpWIZ

THE CARLY APP

The Carly app offers a free lite version. For some brands with supported advanced features, you get a full one-time health check, together with one error report, and one used car check report.
Advanced features are available for BMW, Mini, Toyota, Lexus, VW, Audi, Skoda, Seat, Mercedes, Porsche, Ford, GM and more.

You can purchase a license for an individual car brand or for all car brands.
——————

This is a yearly license. Payment is handled via your Google Play Account. The license automatically renews for one year if not canceled 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. The subscription can be managed in your Account Settings and the automatic renewal can be deactivated there.

Terms of Use
https://bit.ly/35Mxg5s

Privacy Policy
https://bit.ly/35Rruze

Get the Carly app and the Carly Universal Scanner that access data through the OBD2 port of your car. They translate it into powerful diagnostic and repair insights, coding, and maintenance functions, so you can control your car wherever you are.

The scanner and the app work for Audi, BMW, Ford, Mercedes, Mini, Porsche, Renault, Seat, Skoda, Toyota, VW, and almost all car brands in the world with an OBD2 port.

👉Every car is unique — specific features will vary with every model, build year, hardware, and software. Get more details here: https://bit.ly/2WvLfIo
——————————
BASIC FEATURES INCLUDED IN THE (FREE) LITE VERSION

Health (OBD), Live Data (OBD), and Emission Check (OBD) enable you to have control over the most important systems — engine and transmission. Check if they work for your car.

ADVANCED FEATURES INCLUDED IN THE FULL VERSION (YEARLY LICENSE)

Every car is unique, so specific features will vary with every model, build year, hardware, and software. Check here: https://bit.ly/2WvLfIo

🔧 CHECK THE CAR’S HEALTH AND SAVE MONEY
With Carly car diagnostics, you’ll have the right scanner tool to read from all built-in electronic control units (ECUs), including engine, transmission, ABS, airbag, & multimedia, keep track of your car’s health, gauge the severity of problems, clear fault codes, and more.

🔧 GET REPAIR SUPPORT (NEW)
With Smart Mechanic get detailed fault descriptions written by expert mechanics, which will help you to understand your car's fault codes better. Find detailed repair tips which will help you find the cause of the error and perform more repairs on your own.

🔧 CODE AND CUSTOMIZE FEATURES
Access hidden features already set by the manufacturer and customize your car to fit your needs. This feature is only available on certain car brands/models, and the coding options vary.

🔧 PERFORM SIMPLE CAR MAINTENANCE INDEPENDENT OF THE WORKSHOP
Analyze emission and engine gauges, change and register your car battery, perform an oil reset, and much more, all with your smartphone.

🔧 DETECT MILEAGE MANIPULATION
Car mileage manipulation is on the rise. Don’t get tricked. Use Carly to perform a used car inspection before buying.

All of your reports are automatically saved into your account in the Digital Garage.

————————
HOW IT WORKS:

Step 1: Check which features are available for your car model here: https://bit.ly/2WvLfIo
Step 2: Order your Carly Universal Scanner.
Step 3: Plug the scanner into the OBD2 port and log in on this app to check what works for your unique car.
Step 4: Upgrade to the full app version — if available for your car.

THE CARLY UNIVERSAL SCANNER - MOST ADVANCED OBD DEVICE

The OBD2 device was designed to support almost all car brands with an OBD2 port (built 2001 or later), works with both iOS and Android scanner software, and enables advanced Carly features. The scanner comes with:
👉 A 30-year warranty
👉 Premium customer support

Visit https://bit.ly/2xSpWIZ

THE CARLY APP

The Carly app offers a free lite version. For some brands with supported advanced features, you get a full one-time health check, together with one error report, and one used car check report.
Advanced features are available for BMW, Mini, Toyota, Lexus, VW, Audi, Skoda, Seat, Mercedes, Porsche, Ford, GM and more.

You can purchase a license for an individual car brand or for all car brands.
——————

This is a yearly license. Payment is handled via your Google Play Account. The license automatically renews for one year if not canceled 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. The subscription can be managed in your Account Settings and the automatic renewal can be deactivated there.

Terms of Use
https://bit.ly/35Mxg5s

Privacy Policy
https://bit.ly/35Rruze

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- All Carly brands in ONE app
- New app dashboard design & easier access to features, please check it out!
- Improved diagnostics for VW, Audi, Seat and Skoda models between 2015 and 2022
- Extended repair & maintenance guides for all available vehicles in Carly starting 2007

creator: Carly Solutions GmbH & Co KG
descriptionHtml:
The most versatile OBD2 scanner — Carly — is more than a car diagnostic tool and helps over a million car owners on average save £500 a year. Test it yourself now!

Get the Carly app and the Carly Universal Scanner that access data through the OBD2 port of your car. They translate it into powerful diagnostic and repair insights, coding, and maintenance functions, so you can control your car wherever you are.

The scanner and the app work for Audi, BMW, Ford, Mercedes, Mini, Porsche, Renault, Seat, Skoda, Toyota, VW, and almost all car brands in the world with an OBD2 port.

👉Every car is unique — specific features will vary with every model, build year, hardware, and software. Get more details here: https://bit.ly/2WvLfIo
——————————
BASIC FEATURES INCLUDED IN THE (FREE) LITE VERSION

Health (OBD), Live Data (OBD), and Emission Check (OBD) enable you to have control over the most important systems — engine and transmission. Check if they work for your car.

ADVANCED FEATURES INCLUDED IN THE FULL VERSION (YEARLY LICENSE)

Every car is unique, so specific features will vary with every model, build year, hardware, and software. Check here: https://bit.ly/2WvLfIo

🔧 CHECK THE CAR’S HEALTH AND SAVE MONEY
With Carly car diagnostics, you’ll have the right scanner tool to read from all built-in electronic control units (ECUs), including engine, transmission, ABS, airbag, & multimedia, keep track of your car’s health, gauge the severity of problems, clear fault codes, and more.

🔧 GET REPAIR SUPPORT (NEW)
With Smart Mechanic get detailed fault descriptions written by expert mechanics, which will help you to understand your car's fault codes better. Find detailed repair tips which will help you find the cause of the error and perform more repairs on your own.

🔧 CODE AND CUSTOMIZE FEATURES
Access hidden features already set by the manufacturer and customize your car to fit your needs. This feature is only available on certain car brands/models, and the coding options vary.

🔧 PERFORM SIMPLE CAR MAINTENANCE INDEPENDENT OF THE WORKSHOP
Analyze emission and engine gauges, change and register your car battery, perform an oil reset, and much more, all with your smartphone.

🔧 DETECT MILEAGE MANIPULATION
Car mileage manipulation is on the rise. Don’t get tricked. Use Carly to perform a used car inspection before buying.

All of your reports are automatically saved into your account in the Digital Garage.

————————
HOW IT WORKS:

Step 1: Check which features are available for your car model here: https://bit.ly/2WvLfIo
Step 2: Order your Carly Universal Scanner.
Step 3: Plug the scanner into the OBD2 port and log in on this app to check what works for your unique car.
Step 4: Upgrade to the full app version — if available for your car.

THE CARLY UNIVERSAL SCANNER - MOST ADVANCED OBD DEVICE

The OBD2 device was designed to support almost all car brands with an OBD2 port (built 2001 or later), works with both iOS and Android scanner software, and enables advanced Carly features. The scanner comes with:
👉 A 30-year warranty
👉 Premium customer support

Visit https://bit.ly/2xSpWIZ

THE CARLY APP

The Carly app offers a free lite version. For some brands with supported advanced features, you get a full one-time health check, together with one error report, and one used car check report.
Advanced features are available for BMW, Mini, Toyota, Lexus, VW, Audi, Skoda, Seat, Mercedes, Porsche, Ford, GM and more.

You can purchase a license for an individual car brand or for all car brands.
——————

This is a yearly license. Payment is handled via your Google Play Account. The license automatically renews for one year if not canceled 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. The subscription can be managed in your Account Settings and the automatic renewal can be deactivated there.

Terms of Use
https://bit.ly/35Mxg5s

Privacy Policy
https://bit.ly/35Rruze

Get the Carly app and the Carly Universal Scanner that access data through the OBD2 port of your car. They translate it into powerful diagnostic and repair insights, coding, and maintenance functions, so you can control your car wherever you are.

The scanner and the app work for Audi, BMW, Ford, Mercedes, Mini, Porsche, Renault, Seat, Skoda, Toyota, VW, and almost all car brands in the world with an OBD2 port.

👉Every car is unique — specific features will vary with every model, build year, hardware, and software. Get more details here: https://bit.ly/2WvLfIo
——————————
BASIC FEATURES INCLUDED IN THE (FREE) LITE VERSION

Health (OBD), Live Data (OBD), and Emission Check (OBD) enable you to have control over the most important systems — engine and transmission. Check if they work for your car.

ADVANCED FEATURES INCLUDED IN THE FULL VERSION (YEARLY LICENSE)

Every car is unique, so specific features will vary with every model, build year, hardware, and software. Check here: https://bit.ly/2WvLfIo

🔧 CHECK THE CAR’S HEALTH AND SAVE MONEY
With Carly car diagnostics, you’ll have the right scanner tool to read from all built-in electronic control units (ECUs), including engine, transmission, ABS, airbag, & multimedia, keep track of your car’s health, gauge the severity of problems, clear fault codes, and more.

🔧 GET REPAIR SUPPORT (NEW)
With Smart Mechanic get detailed fault descriptions written by expert mechanics, which will help you to understand your car's fault codes better. Find detailed repair tips which will help you find the cause of the error and perform more repairs on your own.

🔧 CODE AND CUSTOMIZE FEATURES
Access hidden features already set by the manufacturer and customize your car to fit your needs. This feature is only available on certain car brands/models, and the coding options vary.

🔧 PERFORM SIMPLE CAR MAINTENANCE INDEPENDENT OF THE WORKSHOP
Analyze emission and engine gauges, change and register your car battery, perform an oil reset, and much more, all with your smartphone.

🔧 DETECT MILEAGE MANIPULATION
Car mileage manipulation is on the rise. Don’t get tricked. Use Carly to perform a used car inspection before buying.

All of your reports are automatically saved into your account in the Digital Garage.

————————
HOW IT WORKS:

Step 1: Check which features are available for your car model here: https://bit.ly/2WvLfIo
Step 2: Order your Carly Universal Scanner.
Step 3: Plug the scanner into the OBD2 port and log in on this app to check what works for your unique car.
Step 4: Upgrade to the full app version — if available for your car.

THE CARLY UNIVERSAL SCANNER - MOST ADVANCED OBD DEVICE

The OBD2 device was designed to support almost all car brands with an OBD2 port (built 2001 or later), works with both iOS and Android scanner software, and enables advanced Carly features. The scanner comes with:
👉 A 30-year warranty
👉 Premium customer support

Visit https://bit.ly/2xSpWIZ

THE CARLY APP

The Carly app offers a free lite version. For some brands with supported advanced features, you get a full one-time health check, together with one error report, and one used car check report.
Advanced features are available for BMW, Mini, Toyota, Lexus, VW, Audi, Skoda, Seat, Mercedes, Porsche, Ford, GM and more.

You can purchase a license for an individual car brand or for all car brands.
——————

This is a yearly license. Payment is handled via your Google Play Account. The license automatically renews for one year if not canceled 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. The subscription can be managed in your Account Settings and the automatic renewal can be deactivated there.

Terms of Use
https://bit.ly/35Mxg5s

Privacy Policy
https://bit.ly/35Rruze

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- All Carly brands in ONE app
- New app dashboard design & easier access to features, please check it out!
- Improved diagnostics for VW, Audi, Seat and Skoda models between 2015 and 2022
- Extended repair & maintenance guides for all available vehicles in Carly starting 2007

The scanner and the app work for Audi, BMW, Ford, Mercedes, Mini, Porsche, Renault, Seat, Skoda, Toyota, VW, and almost all car brands in the world with an OBD2 port.

👉Every car is unique — specific features will vary with every model, build year, hardware, and software. Get more details here: https://bit.ly/2WvLfIo
——————————
BASIC FEATURES INCLUDED IN THE (FREE) LITE VERSION

Health (OBD), Live Data (OBD), and Emission Check (OBD) enable you to have control over the most important systems — engine and transmission. Check if they work for your car.

ADVANCED FEATURES INCLUDED IN THE FULL VERSION (YEARLY LICENSE)

Every car is unique, so specific features will vary with every model, build year, hardware, and software. Check here: https://bit.ly/2WvLfIo

🔧 CHECK THE CAR’S HEALTH AND SAVE MONEY
With Carly car diagnostics, you’ll have the right scanner tool to read from all built-in electronic control units (ECUs), including engine, transmission, ABS, airbag, & multimedia, keep track of your car’s health, gauge the severity of problems, clear fault codes, and more.

🔧 GET REPAIR SUPPORT (NEW)
With Smart Mechanic get detailed fault descriptions written by expert mechanics, which will help you to understand your car's fault codes better. Find detailed repair tips which will help you find the cause of the error and perform more repairs on your own.

🔧 CODE AND CUSTOMIZE FEATURES
Access hidden features already set by the manufacturer and customize your car to fit your needs. This feature is only available on certain car brands/models, and the coding options vary.

🔧 PERFORM SIMPLE CAR MAINTENANCE INDEPENDENT OF THE WORKSHOP
Analyze emission and engine gauges, change and register your car battery, perform an oil reset, and much more, all with your smartphone.

🔧 DETECT MILEAGE MANIPULATION
Car mileage manipulation is on the rise. Don’t get tricked. Use Carly to perform a used car inspection before buying.

All of your reports are automatically saved into your account in the Digital Garage.

————————
HOW IT WORKS:

Step 1: Check which features are available for your car model here: https://bit.ly/2WvLfIo
Step 2: Order your Carly Universal Scanner.

Step 4: Upgrade to the full app version — if available for your car.

THE CARLY UNIVERSAL SCANNER - MOST ADVANCED OBD DEVICE

The OBD2 device was designed to support almost all car brands with an OBD2 port (built 2001 or later), works with both iOS and Android scanner software, and enables advanced Carly features. The scanner comes with:
👉 A 30-year warranty
👉 Premium customer support

Visit https://bit.ly/2xSpWIZ

THE CARLY APP

The Carly app offers a free lite version. For some brands with supported advanced features, you get a full one-time health check, together with one error report, and one used car check report.
Advanced features are available for BMW, Mini, Toyota, Lexus, VW, Audi, Skoda, Seat, Mercedes, Porsche, Ford, GM and more.

You can purchase a license for an individual car brand or for all car brands.
——————

This is a yearly license. Payment is handled via your Google Play Account. The license automatically renews for one year if not canceled 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. The subscription can be managed in your Account Settings and the automatic renewal can be deactivated there.

BASIC FEATURES INCLUDED IN THE (FREE) LITE VERSION

Health (OBD), Live Data (OBD), and Emission Check (OBD) enable you to have control over the most important systems — engine and transmission. Check if they work for your car.

ADVANCED FEATURES INCLUDED IN THE FULL VERSION (YEARLY LICENSE)

Every car is unique, so specific features will vary with every model, build year, hardware, and software. Check here: https://bit.ly/2WvLfIo

🔧 CHECK THE CAR’S HEALTH AND SAVE MONEY

👉 Premium customer support

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: - All Carly brands in ONE app

title: Carly — OBD2 car scanner

creator: Carly Solutions GmbH & Co KG
descriptionHtml:
Carly is the most versatile OBD2 solution, offering diagnostics, engine live data, and guides for car repair and maintenance.
It's helped over a million car owners to save up to $2,000 per year for car-related topics.

Get the Carly app and the Carly Universal Scanner to access data through the OBD2 port of your car.

Unleash your inner car hero with Carly!

It works for Audi, BMW, Ford, Lexus, Mercedes, Mini, Opel, Porsche, Renault, Seat, Skoda, Toyota, VW, and almost all other car brands with an OBD2 port.

As every car is unique, which specific Carly features are available will vary with every model, build year, hardware, and software.

————

BASIC FEATURES INCLUDED IN THE (FREE) BASIC PACKAGE

Diagnostics (OBD), Live Data (OBD), and Emission Check (OBD) enable you to have control over the most important systems — engine and transmission.

ADVANCED FEATURES INCLUDED IN THE PREMIUM PACKAGE (YEARLY LICENSE)

🔧 UNDERSTAND YOUR CAR'S HEALTH
With Carly Diagnostics, you can read and clear fault codes from all built-in electronic control units (ECUs), including engine, transmission, ABS, airbag, and multimedia, keep track of your car’s health, gauge the severity of problems, and more.

🔧 POWERCHARGE YOUR REPAIR SKILLS
Get expert repair guides for your specific issues to help you understand and fix the issues by yourself.

🔧 MONITOR ENGINE LIVE DATA
Live parameters or live data can help you take the guesswork out of understanding what your car needs and narrow down the fault causes.

🔧 PERFORM CAR MAINTENANCE INDEPENDENT OF THE WORKSHOP
The Carly Maintenance feature helps you step-by-step to service your car yourself, reset your service and keep track of your service intervals directly from your phone.

🔧 VIEW THE CONDITION OF YOUR BATTERY
The Carly Battery Check function helps you monitor the status of your car's starter battery, which will help to increase your batterie lifetime.

🔧 CODE AND UNLOCK HIDDEN FEATURES
Access hidden features set by the manufacturer and customize your car to fit your needs. This feature is only available on certain car brands/models, and the coding options vary between each control unit.

🔧 DETECT MILEAGE MANIPULATION
Mileage manipulation is on the rise. Don’t get tricked when buying a used car — use Carly to perform a used car inspection before buying.

————

HOW IT WORKS

Step 1: Check which features are available for your car model
Step 2: Order your Carly Universal Scanner
Step 3: Plug the scanner into the OBD2 port and log in on this app

THE CARLY UNIVERSAL SCANNER — THE MOST ADVANCED OBD DEVICE

The OBD2 device was designed to support almost all car brands with an OBD2 port and to enable advanced Carly features. The scanner comes with:
• A lifetime warranty
• Premium customer support

Take the health of your car into your own hands!

————

You can purchase a subscription for an individual car brand or for all car brands.
This is a yearly subscription. The subscription automatically renews for one year if not canceled at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. The subscription can be managed in your purchases and the automatic renewal can be deactivated there.

Terms of Use: https://bit.ly/35Mxg5s
Privacy Policy: https://bit.ly/35Rruze

title: Carly — OBD2 car scanner

creator: Carly Solutions GmbH & Co KG
descriptionHtml:
Carly is the most versatile OBD2 solution, offering diagnostics, engine live data, and guides for car repair and maintenance.
It's helped over a million car owners to save up to $2,000 per year for car-related topics.

Get the Carly app and the Carly Universal Scanner to access data through the OBD2 port of your car.

Unleash your inner car hero with Carly!

It works for Audi, BMW, Ford, Lexus, Mercedes, Mini, Opel, Porsche, Renault, Seat, Skoda, Toyota, VW, and almost all other car brands with an OBD2 port.

As every car is unique, which specific Carly features are available will vary with every model, build year, hardware, and software.

————

BASIC FEATURES INCLUDED IN THE (FREE) BASIC PACKAGE

Diagnostics (OBD), Live Data (OBD), and Emission Check (OBD) enable you to have control over the most important systems — engine and transmission.

ADVANCED FEATURES INCLUDED IN THE PREMIUM PACKAGE (YEARLY LICENSE)

🔧 UNDERSTAND YOUR CAR'S HEALTH
With Carly Diagnostics, you can read and clear fault codes from all built-in electronic control units (ECUs), including engine, transmission, ABS, airbag, and multimedia, keep track of your car’s health, gauge the severity of problems, and more.

🔧 POWERCHARGE YOUR REPAIR SKILLS
Get expert repair guides for your specific issues to help you understand and fix the issues by yourself.

🔧 MONITOR ENGINE LIVE DATA
Live parameters or live data can help you take the guesswork out of understanding what your car needs and narrow down the fault causes.

🔧 PERFORM CAR MAINTENANCE INDEPENDENT OF THE WORKSHOP
The Carly Maintenance feature helps you step-by-step to service your car yourself, reset your service and keep track of your service intervals directly from your phone.

🔧 VIEW THE CONDITION OF YOUR BATTERY
The Carly Battery Check function helps you monitor the status of your car's starter battery, which will help to increase your batterie lifetime.

🔧 CODE AND UNLOCK HIDDEN FEATURES
Access hidden features set by the manufacturer and customize your car to fit your needs. This feature is only available on certain car brands/models, and the coding options vary between each control unit.

🔧 DETECT MILEAGE MANIPULATION
Mileage manipulation is on the rise. Don’t get tricked when buying a used car — use Carly to perform a used car inspection before buying.

————

Step 1: Check which features are available for your car model
Step 2: Order your Carly Universal Scanner
Step 3: Plug the scanner into the OBD2 port and log in on this app

title: Carly — OBD2 car scanner

creator: Carly Solutions GmbH & Co KG
descriptionHtml:
Carly is the most versatile OBD2 solution, offering diagnostics, engine live data, and guides for car repair and maintenance.
It's helped over a million car owners to save up to $2,000 per year for car-related topics.

Get the Carly app and the Carly Universal Scanner to access data through the OBD2 port of your car.

Unleash your inner car hero with Carly!

It works for Audi, BMW, Ford, Lexus, Mercedes, Mini, Opel, Porsche, Renault, Seat, Skoda, Toyota, VW, and almost all other car brands with an OBD2 port.

As every car is unique, which specific Carly features are available will vary with every model, build year, hardware, and software.

————

BASIC FEATURES INCLUDED IN THE (FREE) BASIC PACKAGE

Diagnostics (OBD), Live Data (OBD), and Emission Check (OBD) enable you to have control over the most important systems — engine and transmission.

ADVANCED FEATURES INCLUDED IN THE PREMIUM PACKAGE (YEARLY LICENSE)

🔧 UNDERSTAND YOUR CAR'S HEALTH
With Carly Diagnostics, you can read and clear fault codes from all built-in electronic control units (ECUs), including engine, transmission, ABS, airbag, and multimedia, keep track of your car’s health, gauge the severity of problems, and more.

🔧 POWERCHARGE YOUR REPAIR SKILLS
Get expert repair guides for your specific issues to help you understand and fix the issues by yourself.

🔧 MONITOR ENGINE LIVE DATA
Live parameters or live data can help you take the guesswork out of understanding what your car needs and narrow down the fault causes.

🔧 PERFORM CAR MAINTENANCE INDEPENDENT OF THE WORKSHOP
The Carly Maintenance feature helps you step-by-step to service your car yourself, reset your service and keep track of your service intervals directly from your phone.

🔧 VIEW THE CONDITION OF YOUR BATTERY
The Carly Battery Check function helps you monitor the status of your car's starter battery, which will help to increase your batterie lifetime.

🔧 CODE AND UNLOCK HIDDEN FEATURES
Access hidden features set by the manufacturer and customize your car to fit your needs. This feature is only available on certain car brands/models, and the coding options vary between each control unit.

🔧 DETECT MILEAGE MANIPULATION
Mileage manipulation is on the rise. Don’t get tricked when buying a used car — use Carly to perform a used car inspection before buying.

————

HOW IT WORKS

Step 1: Check which features are available for your car model
Step 2: Order your Carly Universal Scanner
Step 3: Plug the scanner into the OBD2 port and log in on this app

THE CARLY UNIVERSAL SCANNER — THE MOST ADVANCED OBD DEVICE

The OBD2 device was designed to support almost all car brands with an OBD2 port and to enable advanced Carly features. The scanner comes with:
• A lifetime warranty
• Premium customer support

Take the health of your car into your own hands!

————

You can purchase a subscription for an individual car brand or for all car brands.
This is a yearly subscription. The subscription automatically renews for one year if not canceled at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. The subscription can be managed in your purchases and the automatic renewal can be deactivated there.

title:
Carly — OBD2 car scanner
49.12

creator: Carly Solutions GmbH & Co KG
descriptionHtml:
Carly is a comprehensive OBD2 solution offering diagnostics, engine data, and repair guides. It's saved over a million car owners up to $2,000 annually. Use the Carly app and Universal Scanner to connect through your car's OBD2 port. Compatible with brands like Audi, BMW, Ford, and many others, Carly adapts to each car's model, year, and tech specifications. Unleash your inner car hero with Carly!
————
Free Car History Check


Unlock detailed vehicle histories with the Free Car History Check feature within the carly app without an OBD adapter, your go-to source for comprehensive car reports. Whether you're contemplating a used car purchase or monitoring the background of your vehicle, this app offers essential insights entirely for free.


Key Features:
License Plate Lookup & Decoder: Enter the License plate Number for a thorough history that helps you buy smarter and drive safer.
Accident & Damage Reports: Discover any past accidents and check the damage severity to ensure vehicle safety and value.
Maintenance History: View detailed service logs to understand how well the vehicle has been maintained.
Ownership Timeline: Explore the number of previous owners.
Mileage Checks: Confirm true mileage to prevent odometer tampering.
Safety Recalls: Get updates on past and current safety recalls.
Insurance History: Review insurance records for claim details and status.
Perfect for car buyers, sellers, and enthusiasts, our app equips you with the tools to unveil the true story of any vehicle.
Why Free Car History Check?
Absolutely Free: Full access to all features with no hidden costs.
Effortless to Use: Navigate through a clean, intuitive interface designed for optimal user experience.
Instant Results: Quick and precise information to guide your vehicle decisions.
Secure & Private: Data privacy and security is our top priority, ensuring your information remains protected.
Equip yourself with the knowledge needed to make informed vehicle decisions. Install Free Car History Check today and start your journey to a safer car buying experience!


Basic Package Features (Free):


Diagnostics (OBD), Live Data (OBD), Car History Check, and Emission Check (OBD) enable you to have control over the most important systems — engine and transmission.




The premium package includes advanced features such as (yearly license):


• Carly Diagnostics: Read and clear fault codes from ECUs like the engine, transmission, ABS, and airbag, and monitor your car’s health.


• Repair Guides: Access expert repair guides to fix issues independently.


• Engine Live Data: Monitor live data to understand your car's needs and diagnose issues accurately.


• Car Maintenance: Perform maintenance yourself with step-by-step guides, service resets, and interval tracking via your phone.


• Battery Check: Monitor your car's battery life with the Carly Battery Check.


• Hidden Features Access: Unlock and customize hidden features specific to certain car brands and models.


• Mileage Fraud Detection: Detect mileage tampering to ensure you don’t buy a compromised used car.
————
HOW IT WORKS


Step 1: Check available features for your car model.
Step 2: Order the Carly Universal Scanner.
Step 3: Connect the scanner to your car's OBD2 port and log into the app.
The Carly Universal Scanner is a leading OBD2 device compatible with most car brands, enhancing Carly's advanced features. It includes a lifetime warranty and premium customer support. Manage your car's health directly!
————
You can purchase a subscription for an individual car brand or for all car brands.


This is an annual subscription that auto-renews each year unless canceled at least 24 hours before the current period ends. Manage and deactivate the renewal in your purchases.


Terms of Use: https://bit.ly/35Mxg5s
Privacy Policy: https://bit.ly/35Rruze
